* BrightBlade growled as she sensed Gangon come up beside her but then 
growled even deeper as she saw Lightmare come up beside him, she was going 
back to base not only to get back to her duties but to get away from the new 
bot as well.
She sneezed in disgust as she smelled the sent of the new bot, to her own 
opinion it was a walking cow pie and smelled like one too!
BrightBlade then veered off to the side and away from the new bot, it just 
so happened that she had vired away from Gangon as well. She growled.*

" Either get rid of that walking glue stick or don't follow me, the smell's 
getting to me."

* She then began to take a small short cut towards the base, through a thick 
forest but the bushes were ideal for cover in case of an attack.
It was also the sort of thickness that the toller a bot was the less they 
could get through it, so Gangon and herself could get through easily since 
they were lower to the ground but a bot like Lightmare couldn't even hope to 
get through.
BrightBlade then walked up a small hill covered with pine needles, the hill 
declined sharply so she then decided to jump down. She would have landed 
with ease if there hadn't been for a small dip hidden and filled with 
needles. Her foot sank into the hole and slightly twisted as her other foot 
came down beside it but out of the hole.
BrightBlade yipped in surprise and a bit of pain, she lifted her foot out of 
the hole and looked it over. Twisted ankle.*

"Oh, great! Just what I needed!"

*She then growled but then kept on walking towards the base, a slightly 
pained look on her face and limping heavily. But she didn't care, mainly for 
the reason that no one else cared.*
